role.argrole: entities losing good terms with each other

example.parse: (IP-TPC (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 是否)) (ADVP (AD 因此)) (VP (VV 埋下) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (CP-APP (IP (NP-TMP (NT 今日)) (NP-SBJ (NP (NN 总统府)) (CC 与) (NP-PN (NR 台北市))) (VP (VV 失和))) (DEC 的)) (NP (NN 伏笔))))))
example.arg: 总统府 与 台北市
